title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the user presses 'Ok' after performing a certain action, an error message appears: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently performed as two separate operations. Consequently, setting the output location first leads to an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Perform the action that requires setting the output location and classpath.
2. Set the classpath and output location simultaneously as one operation.
3. Press 'Ok'.
4. Observe the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
